sentences.sContent: Sports motions can cause the redistribution of viscera blood flow.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sports motions can cause the redistribution of viscera blood flow.
sentences.sCn: 运动可引起内脏血流的重新分配。

sentences.sContent: It does have to do with class warfare — redistribution from the poor and the middle class to the wealthy is a consistent theme of all modern Republican policies.
sentences.sContent_eng: It does have to do with class warfare — redistribution from the poor and the middle class to the wealthy is a consistent theme of all modern Republican policies.
sentences.sCn: 它的确跟阶级斗争有关——在穷人、中产阶级和富人之间重新分配财富一直是共和党所有现代政策的一个主题。

remMethod.val: re(重新) + distribution(分配) → 重新分配

trans.tranOther: the act of redistributing something, especially money or land
